mapper.insert: insert into cars( id, cardId, model, color, carType, status, buy_time, maintenance ) values ( #{id}, #{cardId}, #{model}, #{color}, #{carType}, #{status}, #{buy_time}, #{maintenance} )
mapper.update: update cars set cardId = #{cardId}, model = #{model}, color = #{color}, carType = #{carType}, status = #{status}, buy_time = #{buy_time}, maintenance = #{maintenance} where id = #{id}
